name: 9th Saudi Pediatric Neurology Society Conference
content: Chaired by Dr. Ahmad Alanezi, Asst. Professor in Pediatrics at Imam Mohommad Ibn Saud Islamic University in KSA, this year's congress promises an enriching program featuring cutting-edge discussions and insights into various pediatric neurology topics, including: neonatal neurology, SMA, neuroinflammatory disorders, neuromuscular diseases, brain and spinal injury and infections, epilepsy, brain and spinal tumors, cerebrovascular disease, autism, movement disorders, metabolic and genetic disorders, and much more. URLs: Twitter: https://go.evvnt.com/2454255-2?pid=4868 Facebook: https://go.evvnt.com/2454255-3?pid=4868 Twitter: https://go.evvnt.com/2454255-4?pid=4868 Time: 9:00 AM - 5:00 PM Venue details: Crowne Plaza Riyadh Rdc Hotel and Convention, an IHG Hotel, Wadi Al-Maidan, Riyadh, Riyadh region, 12382, Saudi Arabia Prices: Non-SPNS Members Registration Fee: SAR 600.00, SPNS Members Registration Fee: SAR 400.00
